price: Mola wangu Mlezi! Niokoe mimi na ahali zangu na haya wayatendayo.
footnotes: Na akamwomba Mola wake Mlezi amwokoe yeye na ahali zake na wayatendayo wale wajinga, baada ya kwisha kata tamaa kuwa hawamsikilizi.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
